entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to sneak back into the castle.

entities.name: felix felicis
entities.description: A magical potion that Harry has been drinking, which is wearing off as he creeps back into the castle.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: A poltergeist who lives in the castle and is a nuisance to the students.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The portrait of a woman who guards the entrance to the Gryffindor common room, requiring a password to enter.

entities.name: headmaster
entities.description: The person in charge of the school, who has tightened security measures.

relationships.description: Harry can feel the effects of Felix Felicis wearing off as he creeps back into the castle.
Harry meets Peeves on the third floor and narrowly avoids detection by diving through a shortcut.
Harry pulls off his Invisibility Cloak in front of the Fat Lady, who is in a bad mood and refuses to let him in.
Harry is angry with the Headmaster for tightening security measures, which has caused problems for him.
